print(">>> INDEX/CONTAINS")
print("Expected output:")
print(0)
print(1)
print(-1)
print(true)
print(false)
print(2)
print(false)

print("---")

print(index([1,2,3], 1))
print(index([4,5,6], 5))
print(index([1,2,4], 3))
print(contains?(["hi","there"], "hi"))
print(contains?([true,undefined,/hi/], false))

print(index("hello","ll"))
print(contains?("Hi, what's up?", "q"))

print(">>>")
